com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit

Interface Emit.IEmitter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Emitter, EmittingCallbackFn, EmittingCallbackFn.NOP, Request
    Enclosing class:
    Emit

    public static interface Emit.IEmitter
    Interface for objects that can emit/broadcast "events" of various eventIDs

    In node.js the eventIDs are Strings, e.g 'error'. We allow anything. Strings are probably simplest, but Classes and Enums also make sense.

    Author:
    Morgan Conrad Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad

      • listenerCount

        int listenerCount(Object eventID)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        integer count

      • setMaxListeners

        Emitter setMaxListeners(int max)
        Sets the maximum listeners for each eventID. Default = 10
        Parameters:
        max - 0 means unlimited. Use -1 to allow no listeners at all
        Returns:
        this
